definition: To record or note down something, typically used when keeping a systematic account or making an official entry of information. It is commonly employed in various contexts, including administrative tasks, statistical data collection, or documenting progress.

examples.german: Die Firma konnte einen Umsatzanstieg von 10% verzeichnen.
examples.english: The company was able to record a 10% increase in sales.
The club registered an increase in members.

examples.german: Die Stadt hat in den letzten Jahren einen Bevölkerungsrückgang verzeichnet.
examples.english: The city has experienced a decline in population in recent years.

examples.german: Die Studie verzeichnete signifikante Verbesserungen in der Leistungsfähigkeit.
examples.english: The study recorded significant improvements in performance.

examples.german: Die Polizei verzeichnete einen Anstieg der Kriminalitätsrate.
examples.english: The police recorded an increase in the crime rate.
